channel.title: How To Make A Client A Installer So It Installs With Pictures :O
channel.description:
[size=24pt]I Have Updated This Tutorial With Better Pictures And Fixed Some Writing Mistakes Also The Biggest Improvement Is That Instead Of The Client Being 40mb It Is Now 20mb That Is The Same Size As A Regular 317 .rar[/size] [/size][/color] [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/epicwin.png[/img] DIFFICULTIES 5/10 Im going to show you how to make your client install on someones computer i would like to say this will make the total size 40mb around there if the client is a 317. I will be showing you how to do this on a 317 client. First your going to need some programs here are the links #1 JarMaker http://uppit.com/v/MAAFZSTD #2 To Make the Jar a .exe http://download.ej-technologies.com/exe4j/exe4j_windows_4_3.exe #3 A Client here is one i found off mopar Rune-Welfare Client http://uppit.com/v/Z317M9UF #4 A Installer Maker/Wizzard Actual Installer Work Well http://www.actualinstaller.com/download/aisetup.exe [color=blue][color=green]#5 Winrar to extract JarMaker http://www.rarlab.com/rar/wrar392b1.exe[/color][/color] Ok here comes the tutorial :) Start off by extracting The JarMaker your going to need have Winrar installed for this the download link is above. [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/actuall3.png[/img] Run The Jar Maker by going into the folder that you extracted and click JarMaker.jar not JarMaker.bat. [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/actuall4.png[/img] Also your going to need the client for this part if you dont have one. In JarMaker At the top where it says Output File you need to put the folder dictionary to where your client is located also if the client is double foldered like this for example [code]C:\Documents and Settings\Danny\My Documents\Downloads\Client\Dannyz Client[/code] you need to click in Dannyz Client Instead of Client. This is what the main folder of my client is like [code]C:\Documents and Settings\Danny\My Documents\Downloads\Dannyz Client that is the main folder to my client[/code] on the right where it says application.jar change that to client.jar now for the input dictionary once again put the folder where your client is. [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/actuall5.png[/img] Now We have to set the Manifest Template Click on that and where it says Main-Class put "client" then click Set Manifest The Click Create Jar. [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/actuall6.png[/img] Ok once the jar is made you need to make it a .exe so it can become a installer to this run exe4j this is one of the trickest parts. Follow These Steps #1 Start Exe4k #2 Select Regular Mode [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/tut1.jpg[/img] #3 For Short Name Of Your Application Put
Client
#4 For Distribution source directory put your clients folder #5 For Executable source directory put your clients cache folder [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/tut2.jpg[/img] #6 For Executable Name Put "Client Loader" [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/tut3.jpg[/img] #7 Click The Green + and Select Archive and for the Archive Path put the client.jar file that you made in JarMaker [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/tut4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/tut5.jpg[/img] #8 Click Next on the other screens dont mess with the settings once your done making your .exe go to your clients cache folder and move the file Client Loader into the main Clients Folder [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/tut6.jpg[/img] Ok were almost done Run Actual Installer Maker that you downloaded. Now for General put your information [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/tut1-1.png[/img] Click The Installation Tab on the left. For The source folder put the folder of your client where you dragged the .exe we made to. For the main Executable it should automatically put client loader.exe there if it isn't there look click and look for the tab. You can also include a uninstaller by clicking the installation tab. [IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac356/dannydude8/actual2.png[/img] For the Dialogs Tab choose the setting that you want. Once your finished click the green arrow it will start creating your setup file. It should automatically save it in your My Documents Folder. Then you can upload to a filesharing website and give the link to your members. Thanks for reading this tutorial it was my first one so yeah. :) Here is an example of my client if you want to see what the installer looks likes http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?uyztujjdyzw [size=12pt] Please ignore some of the clients when it says it makes the client bigger that was before i updated this now the total size of a 317 client installer is 20mb.[/size]

at com.exe4j.runtime.WinLauncher.main(Unknown Source)

item.title: How To Make A Client A Installer So It Installs With Pictures :O
item.dc:creator: @starbuck777 starbuck777
item.description:
@starbuck777 wrote:

I don’t know if anyone can help me but i followed this tutorial and everything works perfectly…however i sent the file to my friend to see if it works but when he tries to log onto the game, it says error connecting to server except my server was online.
I also sent him the actual client rar. without installer and then it worked…so the problem must be when i created the installer. Can anyone tell me what the problem could be when i created the installer?
Much appreciated

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make A Client A Installer So It Installs With Pictures :O
item.dc:creator: @wicksy wicksy
item.description:
@wicksy wrote:

[quote=“dannydude8, post:27, topic:327966”][quote author=wicksy link=topic=424351.msg3283366#msg3283366 date=1280022995]
Is thier a different process you would have to follow for a 562 client? I just selected everything the same as the 317 but i get a error when runing it. Please help

Btw this is the error i get — java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at com.exe4j.runtime.LauncherEngine.launch(Unknown Source) at com.exe4j.runtime.WinLauncher.main(Unknown Source)
[/quote]

Well for the error, it looks like you messed up the jar. And its possible for a 562 client you just have to create the jar with different classes[/quote]

Well i followed the jar just like in your tutorial. :S How would i make one right for a 562?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

[quote=“wicksy, post:26, topic:327966”]Is thier a different process you would have to follow for a 562 client? I just selected everything the same as the 317 but i get a error when runing it. Please help

Btw this is the error i get — java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at com.exe4j.runtime.LauncherEngine.launch(Unknown Source) at com.exe4j.runtime.WinLauncher.main(Unknown Source) [/quote]

Well for the error, it looks like you messed up the jar. And its possible for a 562 client you just have to create the jar with different classes

item.title: How To Make A Client A Installer So It Installs With Pictures :O
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

I modified the setup process with better pictures and a better way to do this first of all it saves 20mb so the whole file isnt 40mb which is a major improvement. So for everyone saying whats the point of this i list what it does here.

Makes your client look official Makes it easier to start up the client because its in All Programs If your a first time RSPS player it easier then downloading all the stuff. Automatically Downloads the required software needed to run the client instead of searching. Makes It harder to leach good for some people because you can encrypt the files. You can make it have an automatic updater so it checks for the recent files.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Make A Client A Installer So It Installs With Pictures :O
